items.sentence: A solution acceptable to all parties was finally reached.
Can you translate this manuscript from French to English?
Children want to hear the same story over and over again.
Tom can\'t believe Mary knows why John doesn\'t like her.
I wondered why Tom didn\'t seem to enjoy fishing with us.
I\'ll be waiting for you at the station tomorrow morning.
I\'m prepared to give you a second chance if you want it.
I just feel like I\'m not doing what you expect me to do.
I shouldn\'t have to go to the dentist again for a while.
It never occurred to me that Tom would want to meet Mary.
